homeScreenTemplate:
<style class="ng-scope">
   .promptumenu_window {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .verticalSpace {
        margin-top: 25px;
    }
</style>
<script>
try{
setTimeout(function(){MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("onDownloadComplete", function(event, data) {
                    $.unblockUI();
                    $route.reload();
                    $rootScope.$apply(function () {
                        //$location.path("/home");
                        $location.path("/app/FoodDeals/FoodDeals");
                    });
                });
            },1000);
}catch(e){alert(e)}

try{
var e = document.getElementsByClassName("app")[0];
var $injector = angular.element(e).injector();
var $location = $injector.get('$location');
$location.path("/app/FoodDeals/FoodDeals");
}catch(e){alert(e)}


</script>
